subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte dispatched the Tampa Bay Devil Rays in 20 pitches over two innings of a 3-1 victory on Friday. This was the new Pettitte, more of a finesse pitcher after elbow surgery in 2004.
snippet: Andy Pettitte dispatched the Tampa Bay Devil Rays in 20 pitches over two innings of a 3-1 victory on Friday. This was the new Pettitte, more of a finesse pitcher after elbow surgery in 2004.
